import React, { useContext, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Header from './Header' import AuthContext from '../Context/AuthContext' import ArticoliSalvati from './ArticoliSalvati' import ProblemiSalvati from './ProblemiSalvati' import { useHistory } from 'react-router' import { Container, Sidenav, Sidebar, Content, Nav, Icon, FlexboxGrid, Placeholder, Portal } from 'rsuite' import './Profile.css' import imgArticolo from '../img/articolo.png' import imgProblema from '../img/problem-solving.png' import imgManoConPenna from '../img/writing.png' import Cookies from 'js-cookie' export default function Profile() { const history = useHistory() const { Paragraph } = Placeholder const { user } = useContext(AuthContext) const [option, setOption] = useState(true) useEffect(() => { if (Cookies.get('token')) { history.push('/') return
} }, []) return (
{ user ?

{user.name} {user.surname}

:

} setOption(true)} icon={}> Articoli salvati setOption(false)} icon={}> Problemi salvati { user.admin ? }>Scrivi : '' }
{ option ? : }
) }
